name: captions
title: Captions
description: Learn how to upload a caption file and perform in-video searches

control_sets.title: Starting a KalturaSession
control_sets.tip:
Start a KalturaSession (ks) by supplying your Partner ID and Admin Secret.

You can find your info in the [Kaltura Management Console](http://kmc.kaltura.com/index.php/kmc/kmc4#account|integration)

control_sets.title: Select a Media Entry
control_sets.tip:
Choose a video from your library to add captions to. You can then use the page below to upload an SRT file to Kaltura. If you don't have an SRT file handy, you can [download a sample SRT file here](/sample_captions.srt)

JavaScript clients can make use of the [jQuery fileupload plugin](https://github.com/kaltura/jQuery-File-Upload). Others should utilize the ```uploadToken``` service.

control_sets.title: Attaching the Caption File
control_sets.tip: Once you've uploaded the file, you'll need to attach it to the video using ```captionAsset.add``` and ```captionAsset.setContent```

control_sets.title: Searching through Captions
control_sets.tip: You can use ```captionAssetItem.search``` to search for scenes within your videos.
